message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I'd like to save some money if possible.
I understand your desire to save, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $120? It's a fantastic deal for a product you'll find incredibly valuable.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $115? I'm willing to compromise, but I'd like to get as close to my target as possible.
